column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: At 1:40 pm on September 21
column5: an accident between a bus and a Mclaren 720s occurred in Wat Phnom
column6: Daun Penh.------The pricey McLaren motor is reported to belong to a ‘supermarket’ tycoon. After the incident
column7: both vehicles were taken to be stored at the traffic police office waiting for legal settlement. ------Pkarthmor------UPDATE: The owner of the luxury car accepted an apology and will not seek compensation from the bus driver. Instead
column8: he will repair the damage himself.
